channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Lockable Resources Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Lockable Resources Plugin

item.title: CVE-2020-2281|2024-08-04T07:01:41.296Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20lockable%20resources%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Jenkins Lockable Resources Plugin 2.8 and earlier allows attackers to reserve, unreserve, unlock, and reset resources.
